wadidura wimarshana sandaha sakakaruwan serunuwara polisiyata bharadi thibenawa.emenma, laksha 96k pamana watina ayis namathi mathdrawya gram 806k samanga pereda athadanguwata gath indiya jathikayage ema mathdrawya merata beda harina bawata sakakarana pudgalayeku narahenpita pradeshayedi polis mathdrawya karyanshaya eeye athadanguwata gaththa. 37 hawiridi sakakaru kimbaulaala pradeshaye padinchikaruwek.ema karyanshaye jyeshta niladhariyeku kiya sitiye athadanguwata gath sakakaru migamuwa mahesthrath adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen anathuruwa dina 7 k randawagena prashna kirime niyogayak labaganimata balaporoththu wana bawayi.
